title: sa_bhāravi-kirātārjunīya
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śriyaḥ kurūṇām adhipasya pālanīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāsu vṛttiṃ yam ayuṅkta veditum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa varṇiliṅgī viditaḥ samāyayau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvaitavane vanecaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śriyaḥ kurūṇām adhipasya pālanīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prajāsu vṛttiṃ yam ayuṅkta veditum</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa varṇiliṅgī viditaḥ samāyayau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yudhiṣṭhiraṃ dvaitavane vanecaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtapraṇāmasya mahīṃ mahībhuje</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitāṃ sapatnena nivedayiṣyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vivyathe tasya mano na hi priyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravaktum icchanti mṛṣā hitaiṣiṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtapraṇāmasya mahīṃ mahībhuje</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jitāṃ sapatnena nivedayiṣyataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na vivyathe tasya mano na hi priyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pravaktum icchanti mṛṣā hitaiṣiṇaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dviṣāṃ vighātāya vidhātum icchato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rahasy anujñām adhigamya bhūbhṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa sauṣṭhavaudāryaviśeṣaśālinīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viniścitārthām iti vācam ādadhe</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dviṣāṃ vighātāya vidhātum icchato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rahasy anujñām adhigamya bhūbhṛtaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa sauṣṭhavaudāryaviśeṣaśālinīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viniścitārthām iti vācam ādadhe</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kriyāsu yuktair nṛpa cāracakṣuṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vañcanīyāḥ prabhavo 'nujīvibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ato 'rhasi kṣantum asādhu sādhu vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hitaṃ manohāri ca durlabhaṃ vacaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kriyāsu yuktair nṛpa cāracakṣuṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vañcanīyāḥ prabhavo 'nujīvibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ato 'rhasi kṣantum asādhu sādhu vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>hitaṃ manohāri ca durlabhaṃ vacaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kiṃsakhā sādhu na śāsti yo 'dhipaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hitān na yaḥ saṃśṛṇute sa kiṃprabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadānukūleṣu hi kurvate ratiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpeṣv amātyeṣu ca sarvasampadaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa kiṃsakhā sādhu na śāsti yo 'dhipaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hitān na yaḥ saṃśṛṇute sa kiṃprabhuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sada ānukūleṣu hi kurvate ratiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpeṣv amātyeṣu ca sarvasampadaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nisargadurbodham abodhaviklavāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva bhūpatīnāṃ caritaṃ kva jantavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavānubhāvo 'yam abodhi yan mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nigūḍhatattvaṃ nayavartma vidviṣām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nisargadurbodham abodhaviklavāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kva bhūpatīnāṃ caritaṃ kva jantavaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava anubhāvo 'yam abodhi yan mayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nigūḍhatattvaṃ nayavartma vidviṣām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśaṅkamāno bhavataḥ parābhavaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpāsanastho 'pi vanādhivāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durodaracchadmajitāṃ samīhate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayena jetuṃ jagatīṃ suyodhanaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśaṅkamāno bhavataḥ parābhavaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpāsanastho 'pi vanādhivāsinaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>durodaracchadmajitāṃ samīhate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nayena jetuṃ jagatīṃ suyodhanaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tathāpi jihmaḥ sa bhavajjigīṣayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanoti śubhraṃ guṇasampadā yaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samunnayan bhūtim anāryasaṃgamād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaṃ virodho 'pi samaṃ mahātmabhiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tatha āpi jihmaḥ sa bhavajjigīṣayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tanoti śubhraṃ guṇasampadā yaśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samunnayan bhūtim anāryasaṃgamād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>varaṃ virodho 'pi samaṃ mahātmabhiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtāriṣaḍvargajayena mānavīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agamyarūpāṃ padavīṃ prapitsunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vibhajya naktaṃdinam astatandriṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitanyate tena nayena pauruṣam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṛtāriṣaḍvargajayena mānavīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>agamyarūpāṃ padavīṃ prapitsunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vibhajya naktaṃdinam astatandriṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vitanyate tena nayena pauruṣam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhīn iva prītiyujo 'nujīvinaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samānamānān suhṛdaś ca bandhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtādhipatyām iva sādhu bandhutām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sakhīn iva prītiyujo 'nujīvinaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samānamānān suhṛdaś ca bandhubhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa santataṃ darśayate gatasmayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtādhipatyām iva sādhu bandhutām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asaktam ārādhayato yathāyathaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇānurāgād iva sakhyam īyivān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na bādhate 'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asaktam ārādhayato yathāyathaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhajya bhaktyā samapakṣapātayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇānurāgād iva sakhyam īyivān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na bādhate 'sya trigaṇaḥ parasparam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niratyayaṃ sāma na dānavarjitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na bhūri dānaṃ virahayya satkriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravartate tasya viśeṣaśālinī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇānurodhena vinā na satkriyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niratyayaṃ sāma na dānavarjitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na bhūri dānaṃ virahayya satkriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pravartate tasya viśeṣaśālinī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>guṇānurodhena vinā na satkriyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasūni vāñchan na vaśī na manyunā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svadharma ity eva nivṛttakāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurūpadiṣṭena ripau sute 'pi vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nihanti daṇḍena sa dharmaviplavam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vasūni vāñchan na vaśī na manyunā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svadharma ity eva nivṛttakāraṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>gurūpadiṣṭena ripau sute 'pi vā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nihanti daṇḍena sa dharmaviplavam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidhāya rakṣān paritaḥ paretarān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśaṅkitākāram upaiti śaṅkitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyāpavargeṣv anujīvisātkṛtāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtajñatām asya vadanti sampadaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vidhāya rakṣān paritaḥ paretarān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>aśaṅkitākāram upaiti śaṅkitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kriyāpavargeṣv anujīvisātkṛtāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṛtajñatām asya vadanti sampadaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhajya samyag viniyogasatkriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalanty upāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upetya saṃgharṣam ivārthasampadaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anārataṃ tena padeṣu lambhitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhajya samyag viniyogasatkriyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalanty upāyāḥ paribṛṃhitāyatīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>upetya saṃgharṣam iva arthasampadaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anekarājanyarathāśvasaṃkulaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadīyam āsthānaniketanājiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayaty ayugmacchadagandhir ārdratāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛśaṃ nṛpopāyanadantināṃ madaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anekarājanyarathāśvasaṃkulaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadīyam āsthānaniketanājiram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nayaty ayugmacchadagandhir ārdratāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhṛśaṃ nṛpopāyanadantināṃ madaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhena labhyā dadhataḥ kṛṣīvalair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akṛṣṭapacyā iva sasyasampadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitanvati kṣemam adevamātṛkāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirāya tasmin kuravaś cakāsati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sukhena labhyā dadhataḥ kṛṣīvalair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>akṛṣṭapacyā iva sasyasampadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitanvati kṣemam adevamātṛkāś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cirāya tasmin kuravaś cakāsati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahaujaso mānadhanā dhanārcitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanurbhṛtaḥ saṃyati labdhakīrtayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na saṃhatās tasya na bhedavṛttayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyāṇi vāñchanty asubhiḥ samīhitum</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahaujaso mānadhanā dhanārcitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhanurbhṛtaḥ saṃyati labdhakīrtayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na saṃhatās tasya na bhedavṛttayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>priyāṇi vāñchanty asubhiḥ samīhitum</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udārakīrter udayaṃ dayāvataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśāntabādhaṃ diśato 'bhirakṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ pradugdhe 'sya guṇair upasnutā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasūpamānasya vasūni medinī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>udārakīrter udayaṃ dayāvataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśāntabādhaṃ diśato 'bhirakṣayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svayaṃ pradugdhe 'sya guṇair upasnutā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasūpamānasya vasūni medinī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahībhujāṃ saccaritaiś caraiḥ kriyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa veda niḥśesam aśeṣitakriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahodayais tasya hitānubandhibhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīyate dhātur ivehitaṃ phalaiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahībhujāṃ saccaritaiś caraiḥ kriyāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sa veda niḥśesam aśeṣitakriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahodayais tasya hitānubandhibhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratīyate dhātur ivā ihitaṃ phalaiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tena sajyaṃ kvacid udyataṃ dhanur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vā kṛtaṃ kopavijihmam ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇānurāgeṇa śirobhir uhyate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narādhipair mālyam ivāsya śāsanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tena sajyaṃ kvacid udyataṃ dhanur</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vā kṛtaṃ kopavijihmam ānanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>guṇānurāgeṇa śirobhir uhyate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narādhipair mālyam iva asya śāsanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa yauvarājye navayauvanoddhataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhāya duḥśāsanam iddhaśāsanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>makheṣv akhinno 'numataḥ purodhasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhinoti havyena hiraṇyaretasam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sa yauvarājye navayauvanoddhataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhāya duḥśāsanam iddhaśāsanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>makheṣv akhinno 'numataḥ purodhasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhinoti havyena hiraṇyaretasam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='BhKir_1.23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pralīnabhūpālam api sthirāyati</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>praśāsad āvāridhi maṇḍalaṃ bhuvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa cintayaty eva bhiyas tvad eṣyatīr</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>aho durantā balavadvirodhitā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#BhKir_1.23'>
